Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeClawTypeDef.label: lycanthrope claws
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeClawTypeDef.description: The standard claws of a lycanthrope. Attacks with these may infect victims with Sanies Lupinus.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeClawTypeDef.label: galvanized claws
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeClawTypeDef.description: Strong lycanthrope claws sharpened through many hunts. Attacks from these deal increased damage, and do not infect victims with Sanies Lupinus.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeClawTypeDef.label: hardened claws
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeClawTypeDef.description: Strong lycanthrope claws blunted through many hunts. Attacks from these deal high blunt damage, and do not infect victims with Sanies Lupinus.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeClawTypeDef.label: infernal claws
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeClawTypeDef.description: Lycanthrope claws smouldering with an otherwordly fire. Attacks from these have a chance to ignite the target.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeClawTypeDef.label: magnetic claws
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeClawTypeDef.description: Lycanthrope claws pulsing with electricity. Attacks from these deal additional EMP damage.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeClawTypeDef.label: noxious claws
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeClawTypeDef.description: Lycanthrope claws dripping with a toxic concoction. Attacks from these inflict toxic buildup.

Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeClawTypeDef.label: silver claws
Mashed_Bloodmoon.LycanthropeClawTypeDef.description: Lycanthrope claws coated in silver. Attacks from these deal increased damage to lycanthropes, but also increase pain factor.
